Text.Name: Diaster_Drought
Text.Desc: There has been a drought. Food is needed to prevent starvation due to bad harvests.

Text.Name: Diaster_Flood
Text.Desc: There has been a flood. Stones are needed to help people build dams against the flood.

Text.Name: Diaster_Siberia
Text.Desc: There has been a cold wave. Wood is needed to help people stay warm.

Text.Name: Diaster_EarthQuake
Text.Desc: There has been an earthquake. Stones are needed to help people rebuild their houses.
